ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hbim.1 | |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) |
| 2 |  | hbim.2 | |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) |
| 3 |  | hb.3 | |- ( ch -> A. x ch ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) <-> ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ch ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_hban | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> A. x ( ph /\ ps ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_hban | |- ( ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ch ) -> A. x ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ch ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_hbxfrbi | |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) -> A. x ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) ) |
